title: [peace it]
tutorial_info:
The goal is to make all cells "peaceful" within minimal moves number.

Let`s try to flip cells to see how it works.
tutorial_flips:
If you are unable to complete the level and there are no hints left to view the solution, you can flip single cell.

Click on the blinking icon and then on the cell you want to flip..

Try it, it's easy!
tutorial_solution: Use the hint, solve this level by clicking on the flashing icon.
reset_data_dialog:

All game progress will be lost.
